sqp.name: bymonth
sqp.sql: SELECT location_id, product_id, act_date, COUNT(act_id) AS acts FROM oizcp GROUP BY location_id, product_id, act_date

sqp.name: defaulters_aggregate
sqp.sql: SELECT overdue / 86400 AS days_overdue, location_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_children FROM (SELECT patient_id, location_id, -(max_date - strftime('%s', 'now')) AS overdue FROM oizcp WHERE product_id IS NOT NULL AND max_date IS NOT NULL AND max_date < strftime('%s', 'now') GROUP BY patient_id) WHERE overdue > 0 GROUP BY overdue, location_id

sqp.name: defaulters
sqp.sql: SELECT patient_id, location_id, -(max_date - strftime('%s', 'now')) / 86400 AS days_overdue, product_id FROM oizcp WHERE product_id IS NOT NULL AND max_date IS NOT NULL AND max_date < strftime('%s', 'now')
